pages.text: A $(item)Spellbook/$ might be considered the culmination of my art. It acts much like an entire library of $(l:items/focus)$(item)Foci/$.$(br2)Each page can hold a single iota. I can select the active page that reads and writes will happen on by sneak-scrolling while holding it, or simply scrolling if it's in my other hand while casting a _Hex.
$(italic)Wizards love words. Most of them read a great deal, and indeed one strong sign of a potential wizard is the inability to get to sleep without reading something first.
